shortDescription.en: ZeroTip ‚Äî an indie game made in 3 days for the Loop theme, where you play as the last courier of 3077, rewinding time, teleporting, and using echoes of yourself to deliver pizza through a ruined cosmos.
shortDescription.pl: ZeroTip ‚Äî an indie game made in 3 days for the Loop theme, where you play as the last courier of 3077, rewinding time, teleporting, and using echoes of yourself to deliver pizza through a ruined cosmos.

description.en:
ZeroTip is an indie game created in just 3 days during a game jam.
The jam‚Äôs theme was ‚ÄúLoop‚Äù, and our team brought it to life through the time rewind mechanic.

The game features two levels:

üéì Tutorial ‚Äî a training level to master the basics;

üöÄ Main Level ‚Äî a fully playable mission that‚Äôs challenging, fast-paced, and addictive.

The story takes place in the year 3077.
The world has fallen apart, civilization is gone ‚Äî but delivery is sacred.
You are the last Glovo courier, racing through dead space to deliver pizza to the last hungry client.
Star storms, debris, and time distortions stand in your way.
But this time... something went wrong.

The ‚ÄúLoop‚Äù theme is revealed through unique mechanics:

‚è™ Time rewind ‚Äî return to crucial moments to fix mistakes;

‚ú® Teleportation ‚Äî instant movement through space;

üßä Echoes of yourself ‚Äî frozen copies that remain in time, creating strategic possibilities.

ZeroTip is a game about endless retries, time paradoxes, and the belief that even at the end of the universe ‚Äî the delivery must be made. üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüçïüí´

Our Team:
üë®‚Äçüíª Dmytro Chekaliuk ‚Äî Programmer
üë®‚Äçüíª Illia Avdosiev ‚Äî Programmer
üé® Volodymyr Kidin ‚Äî 3D Designer

shortDescription.en: Day Planner ‚Äî Organize your day! A convenient tool to manage tasks and finances in one place.
shortDescription.pl: Day Planner ‚Äî Organize your day! A convenient tool to manage tasks and finances in one place.
shortDescription.de: Day Planner ‚Äî Organize your day! A convenient tool to manage tasks and finances in one place.

description.en:
Day Planner ‚Äî Organize your day! A convenient tool to manage your tasks and track your finances in one place.

About the Project: This application was my first professional assignment at my first developer job. It was developed within one week as an MVP (Minimum Viable Product). The focus was on high performance and clean code architecture to ensure future scalability.

Key Features:
Task Management: Create tasks with titles and descriptions, and track progress with checkboxes.
Finance Manager: Track income and expenses with integrated statistics.
Notifications: Dynamic reminders for daily tasks and financial updates.
Data Migration: Daily results automatically transfer to the "Week" tab, and weekly data moves to "Month."
Success Tracking: Analyze your productivity and financial health throughout the month.

Technical Stack:
Engine & Language: Unity, C#.
Animations: Powered by the DOTween library for a fluid UI experience.
Data Persistence: Implemented using PlayerPrefs.
UI/UX: Minimalist and calm design, built for ease of use.
